channel.title: Learning 2021 on MCPT Learning Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Learning 2021 on MCPT Learning Resources

item.title: Game Series
item.description: Game Series Welcome to the return of MCPT’s Game Development Series! Inspired by Bloons Tower Defense, you will learn how to code your very own tower-defense game in Processing by the end of a series of workshops. Keep scrolling through the pages to dive in!

item.title: Game Jam
item.description: Game Jam This event ended on December 31st, 2021.Our five day Game Jam has come to a close, and with it, we’re excited to announce the winners! We hope you had a good time these past few days, no matter if you won something or if you didn’t have time to finish everything! Best Overall Game: Maze Marauder Most User-Friendly Game: Bunbun’s Adventure Most Replayable Game: Santa Down Best Gamer: James Huynh

item.title: LyonHacks
item.description: Lyon Hacks William Lyon Mackenzie’s Annual Hackathon! Jump To: LyonHacks - Season II (2022) Past Events
